summary: Ever notice, khajiit female tails aren't anatomically correct in placement? This will fix that.
descriptionHtml:
This was a work of collaboration between my direction and Derok's work. I've had permission to post this for a while but only just recently thought of putting it up here. It's specifically for the two legged female "putty tats" of Skyrim.

Download the femaletailkhajiit.nif and put it in this folder:

Data / meshes / actors / character / character assets

and PRESTO! No more butt plug tails.

This will also work for the Ohmes Raht. Just gotta copy and paste the file into the Ohmes folder separately.
author: CrashMasterJmm and Derok
